div.p: This value set defines a base set of codes that can be used to indicate that the content in a resource was developed with a focus and intent of supporting use within particular contexts.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/usps-state
Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/practitioner-specialty

Include codes from
http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 394733009 (Medical specialties)
Include all codes defined in urn:iso:std:iso:3166
Include all codes defined in urn:iso:std:iso:3166
Include codes from http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/m49/m49.htm where class = region

Include codes from
http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 387961004 (Kingdom Animalia)
Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender
Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-code
Include all codes defined in http://nucc.org/provider-taxonomy
Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-ActEncounterCode
Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-ActTaskCode
